channel.title: CVE Feed for NortonLifeLock -- Avast and AVG Antivirus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NortonLifeLock -- Avast and AVG Antivirus

item.title: CVE-2022-4173|2024-08-03T01:34:49.315Z -- nortonlifelock -- avast%20and%20avg%20antivirus
item.description: A vulnerability within the malware removal functionality of Avast and AVG Antivirus allowed an attacker with write access to the filesystem, to escalate his privileges in certain scenarios. The issue was fixed with Avast and AVG Antivirus version 22.10.
